Paw Print Kennels

Pembroke Welsh Corgi

The Pembroke Welsh Corgi lineage has been traced back as far as 1107 AD. It is said that the Vikings and Flemish weavers brought the dogs with them as they traveled to reside in Wales. As far back as the 10th century, corgis were herding sheep, geese, ducks, horses, and cattle as one of the oldest herding breed of dogs.

Coat Colors


  • Red

  • Fawn

  • Sable

  • Black and Tan

Corgi's In popular culture

  1. Cowboy Bebop features an extraordinarily intelligent Pembroke Welsh Corgi named Ein.
  2. Lil' Lightning from 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure is a Pembroke Welsh Corgi.
  3. In RWBY, Ruby and Yang have a Pembroke Welsh Corgi named Zwei, who is sent to them by their father Taiyang and may be a reference to Ein.
  4. Well-known for their association with Queen Elizabeth II, who has owned more than 30 during her reign.
Site by Corgi Fan, 2015.
